00040 
00041 #ifndef KS0108_H
00042 #define KS0108_H
00043 
00044 #include "../global.h"
00045 
00046 #include "ks0108conf.h"
00047 
00048 // HD61202/KS0108 command set
00049 #define GLCD_ON_CTRL            0x3E    // 0011111X: lcd on/off control
00050 #define GLCD_ON_DISPLAY         0x01    //              DB0: turn display on
00051 
00052 #define GLCD_START_LINE         0xC0    // 11XXXXXX: set lcd start line
00053 
00054 #define GLCD_SET_PAGE           0xB8    // 10111XXX: set lcd page (X) address
00055 #define GLCD_SET_Y_ADDR         0x40    // 01YYYYYY: set lcd Y address
00056 
00057 #define GLCD_STATUS_BUSY        0x80    // (1)->LCD IS BUSY
00058 #define GLCD_STATUS_ONOFF       0x20    // (0)->LCD IS ON
00059 #define GLCD_STATUS_RESET       0x10    // (1)->LCD IS RESET
00060 
00061 // determine the number of controllers
00062 // (make sure we round up for partial use of more than one controller)
00063 #define GLCD_NUM_CONTROLLERS    2 //((GLCD_XPIXELS+GLCD_CONTROLLER_XPIXELS-1)/GLCD_CONTROLLER_XPIXELS)
00064 
00065 // typedefs/structures
00066 typedef struct struct_GrLcdCtrlrStateType {
00067         unsigned char xAddr;
00068         unsigned char yAddr;
00069 } GrLcdCtrlrStateType;
00070 
00071 typedef struct struct_GrLcdStateType {
00072         unsigned char lcdXAddr;
00073         unsigned char lcdYAddr;
00074         GrLcdCtrlrStateType ctrlr[GLCD_NUM_CONTROLLERS];
00075 } GrLcdStateType;
00076 
00077 // function prototypes
00078 void glcd_init_hw(void);
00079 void glcd_busy_wait(u08 controller);
00080 void glcd_control_write(u08 controller, u08 data);
00081 u08  glcd_control_read(u08 controller);
00082 void glcd_data_write(u08 data);
00083 u08  glcd_data_read(void);
00084 void glcd_set_x_address(u08 xAddr);
00085 void glcd_set_y_address(u08 yAddr);
00086 u08 glcd_get_x_address(void);
00087 u08 glcd_get_y_address(void);
00088 u08 get_data_port(void);
00090 void glcd_init(void);
00092 void glcd_clear_screen(void);
00094 void glcd_home(void);
00096 void glcd_goto_char(u08 line, u08 col);
00098 void glcd_set_address(u08 x, u08 yLine);
00100 void glcd_start_line(u08 start);
00102 void glcd_delay(u16 p);
00103 #endif
